SlayByDay:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
SlayByDay:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

SlayByDay:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
SlayByDay:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
SlayByDay:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

SlayByDay:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
SlayByDay:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

SlayByDay:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
SlayByDay:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !SlayByDay:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

SlayByDay:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
SlayByDay:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !SlayByDay:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

SlayByDay:Synchronize.NAME: Synchronize
SlayByDay:Synchronize.DESCRIPTION: When you swap to Human form, draw !M! card. NL When you swap to Spirit form, gain !M! strength, and at the end of this turn, lose !M! strength.
SlayByDay:Synchronize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you swap to Human form, draw !M! cards. NL When you swap to Spirit form, gain !M! strength, and at the end of this turn, lose !M! strength.

Prediction.NAME: Prediction
Prediction.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Next turn, gain !B! block.
Prediction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Next turn, gain !B! block.

DefensiveManeuvers.NAME: Defensive Maneuvers
DefensiveManeuvers.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain !B! block. Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.
DefensiveManeuvers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain !B! block. Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

EvilEye.NAME: Evil Eye
EvilEye.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Apply !M! weak and vulnerable.
EvilEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Apply !M! weak and vulnerable.

PiercingGaze.NAME: Piercing Gaze
PiercingGaze.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.
PiercingGaze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

ClawSlash.NAME: Claw Slash
ClawSlash.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! vulnerable.
ClawSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! vulnerable.

Recollect.NAME: Recollect
Recollect.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your draw pile.
Recollect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your draw pile.

Forget.NAME: Forget
Forget.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !M! strength and !M! Dexterity. Exhaust a random card in your hand.
Forget.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !M! strength and !M! Dexterity. Exhaust a random card in your hand.

Hone.NAME: Hone
Hone.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.
Hone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

Punishment.NAME: Punishment
Punishment.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Consume all debuffs on target. Deal !D! damage per debuff consumed.
Punishment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Consume all debuffs on target. Deal !D! damage per debuff consumed.

Fury.NAME: Fury
Fury.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Lose all strength. Deal !M! damage for each strength lost.
Fury.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Lose all strength. Deal !M! damage for each strength lost.

SplashDamage.NAME: Splash Damage
SplashDamage.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Whenever a potion is consumed, deal !M! damage to all enemies.
SplashDamage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Whenever a potion is consumed, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

PowerUp.NAME: Power Up
PowerUp.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Whenever you gain strength, gain !M! additional strength.
PowerUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Whenever you gain strength, gain !M! additional strength.

TacticalRetreat.NAME: Tactical Retreat
TacticalRetreat.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain !B! block. Lose !M! vulnerable.
TacticalRetreat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain !B! block. Lose !M! vulnerable.

Blitz.NAME: Blitz
Blitz.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage. Lose all your block.
Blitz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage. Lose all your block.

Bolster.NAME: Bolster
Bolster.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Increase this card's block by !M! this combat.
Bolster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Increase this card's block by !M! this combat.

Fly.NAME: Fly
Fly.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain flight for one turn.
Fly.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain flight for one turn.

Roost.NAME: Roost
Roost.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. Deal damage equal to your Dexterity. (Deals !D! damage.)
Roost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. Deal damage equal to your Dexterity. (Deals !D! damage.)

Resupply.NAME: Resupply
Resupply.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain X Refill until end of turn. Exhaust.
Resupply.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain X+1 Refill until end of turn. Exhaust.

Resurgence.NAME: Resurgence
Resurgence.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain 1 Strength, Dexterity, or Thorns (at random) X times. Exhaust.
Resurgence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain 1 Strength, Dexterity, or Thorns (at random) X+1 times. Exhaust.

Possession.NAME: Possession
Possession.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Switch into Spirit form.
Possession.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Switch into Spirit form.

Expulsion.NAME: Expulsion
Expulsion.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Switch into Human form.
Expulsion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Switch into Human form.
